Class DeviceServiceGrpc.DeviceServiceBlockingStub

java.lang.Object
io.grpc.stub.AbstractStub<DeviceServiceGrpc.DeviceServiceBlockingStub>

org.jscience.server.proto.DeviceServiceGrpc.DeviceServiceBlockingStub
Enclosing class:
DeviceServiceGrpc
public static final class DeviceServiceGrpc.DeviceServiceBlockingStub extends io.grpc.stub.AbstractBlockingStub<DeviceServiceGrpc.DeviceServiceBlockingStub>
A stub to allow clients to do synchronous rpc calls to service DeviceService. 
Service for controlling remote scientific instruments
